name: YouTube Night Mode v1.0-beta
description:
ATTENTION: YouTube offers a native DARK MODE if you are logged in!

Only use this style if you do not want to use a Google account!

Night Mode for the YouTube design published on 2017-08-30!

If you find bugs or if you are having problems feel free to leave a comment. If I can find some time I'll make sure to look into it! (But no promises :p)
additional_info:
v1.1-beta

- Fixed account menu background color

v1.0-beta

- Fixed playlists background color

v0.9-beta

- Background color showed be fixed for all pages now!

v0.8-beta

- Really fixed player controls (this time)

v0.7-beta

- Fixed player controls!

v0.6-alpha

- Fixed disappearing channel links
- Fixed missing highlight of channel links

v0.5-alpha

- Fixed search bar not showing text

v0.4-alpha

- Channel pages now show banner correctly

v0.3-alpha

- Fixed YouTube logo not being red
- Added comments

v0.2-alpha

- Fixed background color for channel pages
- Fixed sub buttons on channel pages

v0.1-alpha

Quickly scrambled this together after I saw that the other YouTube styles are not compatible anymore

discussions.name: need more work , thanks for saving my eyeZ <3
